channel.title: Chord Creators In Auxy
channel.description: There should be chord creators in Auxy. Like, you turn on a setting, start placing notes and the app automatically creates chords based on the key of the project.

item.title: Chord Creators In Auxy
item.dc:creator: MetricMusicDivision
item.description:
There should be chord creators in Auxy. Like, you turn on a setting, start placing notes and the app automatically creates chords based on the key of the project.
